GSP29vnyps32u:2: nyā. pa. śa. 20 atha pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyavibhāga evānupapannaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:6: “mantrakṛdbhyaḥ” “tasya ha vā etasya mahato bhūtasya niśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ” “ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire /
GSP29vnyps32u:22: kramaviśeṣeṇānuccāryamāṇānāṃ varṇānāṃ kathaṃ padatvaṃ vākyatvaṃ veti cenna,
GSP29vnyps32u:29: pratipanne nirbādhe cārthe pradhāne bodhakatvasyaiva tātparyarūpatvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:33: tathā bhāṣyam--- “svaśāsanāvabodhi śāstramiti nityaṃ śrutyaiva niyuṅkte paraḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:50: nyā. pa. śa. 21 api ca bāhyāgamapratibandiḥ kiṃ vadeprāmāṇyamāptaprāmāṇyanibandhanamitīcchadbhirvaiśeṣikādibhirucyate ?
GSP29vnyps32u:61: prāmāṇyasya parokṣaprāmāṇyasya vākyaprāmāṇyasya ca sthāpitatvena vaidikavākye hyautsargike
GSP29vnyps32u:66: nyā. pa. śa. 22 ata eva hi prekṣāvantaraścoditeṣu bahuvittavyayāyāsasādhyeṣu niśaṅkaṃ pravartante,
GSP29vnyps32u:82: na hi yatkiñcidanena kṛtamiti matvā kaścit kṛcchrasaṃpāditān dhanādīn dadāti,
GSP29vnyps32u:85: api tu kutaścit pramāṇāt siddhaṃ praśastācaraṇamabhimatyaiva /
GSP29vnyps32u:98: te kathaṃ lokottaraprajñena tvayā pratārakā ityunnītāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:100: pramāṇasvarūpaphalayorabādhasya ca pratyakṣatvāt dharmabuddhyaiva ca nirupādhikaparigrahasya tvaduktyaiva siddhaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:101: anādinidhanesminnāmnāyamūle anuṣṭhāne pravahati prakriyāntaramāśritya pratārakairīśvarairarvācīnaiśca praticchandapravartanā śrutismṛtisiddhā yuktimatī cetyeṣā dik //
GSP29vnyps32u:102: nyā. pa. śa. 23 vedānityatvānumānānāṃ pratiprayogāśca---parvāparakalpāḥ etadvedasandarbhapāṭhavantaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:110: aprāmāṇyamicchatopi mahājanaparigrahānyathānupapattyaiva prāmāṇyaṃ prasādhya tata eva tatsādhanāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:118: vedaśabdaprayogaviṣayatāmātreṇa teṣāmapi pakṣīkāre svecchāgṛhītarūpasyeśvarasya tattadavatārasaṃvyavahārā vedavyatiriktāḥ santi sapakṣāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:156: nyā. pa. śa. 24 tathāpi sargapralayasaṃbhavāt saṃpradāyavicchede sarvavedocchedāt paścādīśvarastatsraṣṭā syāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:161: evaṃ mantranityatve ca tulyanyāyatayā brāhmaṇanityatvasyāpi dustyajatvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:164: “yā brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti pūrvaṃ yo vai vedāṃśca prahiṇoti tasmai /
GSP29vnyps32u:165: ” “vācāvirūpanityayā““pūrve pūrvebhyo vaca etadūcuḥ” “ajān ha vai praśnīṃstapasyamānāt
GSP29vnyps32u:166: brahma svayaṃ bhyabhyānar ṣat ta ṛṣayobhavan tadṛṣīṇāmṛṣitvam” “anādinidhanā hyeṣā
GSP29vnyps32u:184: keṣāṃ cinnityasaṃsārapakṣe prathamasya hetostathā tatpratipādakairāgamairaṃśato bādhaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:193: nyā. pa. śa. 25 vipakṣe bādhakaṃ na samyagdṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:198: uktaṃ ca prajñāparitrāṇe--- “vedataḥ pauruṣeyatvaśaṅkā vede na śāmyati /
GSP29vnyps32u:202: vedārtho naiva śakyeta boddhuṃ tasyeti cenna tat //
GSP29vnyps32u:222: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā vyāsena--- “yugāntentarhitān vedān setihāsān maharṣayaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:232: idaṃ ca sarvaṃ prasādhitaṃ prajñāparitrāṇe--- “yādṛkprabhāvāḥ śrūyante ṛṣyādyā vedarāśiṣu /
GSP29vnyps32u:233: tādṛśā eva sṛjyante vedān dṛṣṭvā svayaṃbhuvā //
GSP29vnyps32u:245: nyā. pa. śa. 27 varṇānityatvaṃ kramānityatā vā nābhimatavedanityatvavirodhi /
GSP29vnyps32u:255: nyā. pa. śa. 28 vedārthasaṅgahe tu---vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ cet,
GSP29vnyps32u:257: prāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānām 'autpattikastu śabdasyārtthena saṃbandhaḥ' ityuktam” iti mantrārthavādayorapi yāthārthyaṃ prakramya,
GSP29vnyps32u:259: tata eva śabdānumānavivekaḥ pauruṣeyāpauruṣeyādivibhāgādikaṃ ca vyaktaṃ pradarśitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:263: na ca hastaceṣṭādivat saṅketamūlaṃ śabdasya bodhakatvamiti vaktuṃ yuktam,
GSP29vnyps32u:266: tāni sarvāṇi sākṣādvā paramparayā vā vijñāyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:268: teṣu sākṣādvā paramparayāṃ vā saṃketo jñāyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:269: gavādiśabdānāṃ tu anādyamusandhānāvicchedepi saṃketājñānādeva bodhakatvaśaktiḥ svābhāvikī /
GSP29vnyps32u:271: nyā. pa. śa. 29 nanu ca indriyavacchabdasyāpi bodhakatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ cet,
GSP29vnyps32u:281: evaṃ gṛhītasaṃbandhasya bodhakatvadarśanādanādyanusaṃdhānāvicchedepi saṃṅketājñānāt bodhakatvavaṃ śaktireveti niścīyate //
GSP29vnyps32u:282: evaṃ bodhakānāṃ padasaṃghātānāṃ saṃsargaviśeṣabodhakatvena vākyaśabdābhidheyānāmuccāraṇakramo yatra puruṣabuddhipūrvakaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:287: yat pūrvoccāraṇakramajanitasaṃskāreṇa kramaviśeṣaṃ smṛtvā tenaiva krameṇoccāryatvam /
GSP29vnyps32u:288: tenānupūrvīviśeṣeṇa tameva saṃsthitā akṣararāśayo vedā ṛgyajuḥsāmātharvabhedena bhinnāḥ anantaśākhā vartanta iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:296: “vasantāya kapiñjalānālabhante” ityādayastu mantrā api vidhiparā eva mīmāṃsitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:304: te tu praṇavayogāyogādibhirvaidikāḥ tāntrikāḥ iti vibhajyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:308: sarveṣāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ sadvārakamadvārakaṃ ca paramātmaiva pratipādyaḥ phalapradaśca /
GSP29vnyps32u:317: sa ca kvācid vidhyekavākyatayā pramāṇībhavatītyarthavādādhikaraṇādiṣu sthāpitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:318: svataḥ prayojanabhūtārthaviśeṣaviṣayastu svatantratayāpi prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnotīti samanvayasūtrasiddham /
GSP29vnyps32u:325: nyā. pa. śa. 32 hitānuśāsanarūpaṃ vākyamiha vidhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:328: tatraivaṃ vivekaḥ--- aprāptasya vidhau prāptirniyame prāptapūraṇam /
GSP29vnyps32u:330: nyā. pa. śa. 33 athātra ko nāma liṅādipratyayārthaḥ ?
GSP29vnyps32u:342: kāraṇāntarādarśanāt yadanantaraṃ yat dṛśyate tattasya kāraṇamiti prayojakavṛddhavākyameva
GSP29vnyps32u:344: tathā kasyacit 'putraste jātaḥ' iti kenacidukte pratipannaputrotpattestasya priyatvaṃ ca jñāyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:345: vyutpitsuḥ putrajanmavākyaśrāviṇaḥ puruṣasya mukhavikāsamālokya tasya priyārthapratiprattinimittatvānumānāt
GSP29vnyps32u:347: na ca putrajanmanaḥ priyatvaṃ bālenājñātamiti vācyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:350: nyā. pa. śa. 34 tataśca ye bālānāṃ priyatvena saṃpratipannā bhakṣyabhojyādayaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:351: taddarśī vyutpitsustatsaṃpattiśrāviṇaḥ puruṣasya mukhavikāsadarśanādiprakriyayā vyutpadyata iti kiṃ nopapadyate ?
GSP29vnyps32u:356: gavānayanepi vatsasaṃyojanakṣīrasaṃpādanādikartavyatābodhakepi vākye tadarthagavānayanasaṃbhavād gāmānametyādivākyaṃ gavānayanakartavyataikabodhakamiti kathaṃ niścinuyāt ?
GSP29vnyps32u:358: tadevaṃ putrajanmavākyodāharaṇasamīkārasya mandamatīnāṃ durārohatvāt tadupekṣaṇena spaṣṭataravyutpattiprakāro yādṛcchiko buddhipūrvaśca bhāṣyakārairdarśitaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:362: ityabhiprāyeṇāṅgulyā nirdiśya nirdiśya taistaiḥ śabdaisteṣu teṣu bahuśaḥ śikṣitāḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:363: śanaiḥ śanaistaireva śabdaisteṣu teṣvartheṣu svātmanāṃ budhdyutpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā śabdārthayoḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:364: saṃbandhāntarādarśanāt saṅketayitṛpuruṣājñānācca teṣvartheṣu teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogo
GSP29vnyps32u:366: punaśca vyutpannetaraśabdeṣvasya śabdasyāyamartha iti pūrvavṛddhaiḥ śikṣitāḥ sarvaśabdānāmarthamavagamya parapratyāyanāya tattadarthāvabodhi vākyajātaṃ prayuñjate /
GSP29vnyps32u:367: prakārāntareṇāpi śabdārthasaṃbandhāvadhāraṇaṃ suśakam---kenacit puruṣeṇa hastaceṣṭādinā 'pitā te sukhamāste,
GSP29vnyps32u:368: iti devadattāya jñāpaya'” iti preṣitaḥ kaścit tajjñāpane pravaṛttaḥ 'pitā te sukhamāste' iti śabdaṃ prayuṅkte;
GSP29vnyps32u:369: pārśvasthonyo vyutpitsurmūkavacceṣṭāviśeṣajñaḥ tajjñāpane pravṛttamimaṃ jñātvānugataḥ tajjñāpanāya prayuktamimaṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā,
GSP29vnyps32u:370: ayaṃ śabdastadarthabuddhiheturiti niścinotīti kāryārtha eva vyutpattiriti nirbandho nirnibandhanaḥ” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:371: nyā. pa. śa 35 atra pitā te sukhamāsta iti vākyasya sthāne apavarake daṇḍaḥ sthitaḥ ityudāharaṇāntaramātramanyatroktam /
GSP29vnyps32u:379: ato yathā padānāṃ prātisvikī śaktiḥ siddhe kāryepīti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ niṣkṛṣyate,
GSP29vnyps32u:385: ataḥ sukhe duḥkhanivṛttau vā sākṣāt kāryatvabodhaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:390: abhyupagamepi laukikasevyaprītyeva devatāprītyaiva śrutyādisiddhayā kālāntarabhāviphalasiddhauliṅvācyatayā svarūpeṇa vā tatkalpanāyogāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:393: pratītaṃ ca devatāprītyātmakamevāpūrvaṃ liṅvācyatayā svarūpeṇa vā dvāramupakalpyatām; kimanyena ? //
GSP29vnyps32u:394: nyā. pa. śa. 36 yacca jalpantyardhalokāyatikāḥ--- “vigraho havirādānaṃ yugapat karmasannidhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:395: prītiḥ phalapradānaṃ ca devatānāṃ na vidyate” //
GSP29vnyps32u:397: na hi svataḥ pramāṇāmnāyasmṛtipurāṇādisiddhāḥ sādhakabādhakapramāṇāgocarāḥ devatāvigrahādayo hātuṃ yuktāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:401: stutyā vidhiśeṣabhūteṣvapyarthavādeṣu tadarthatayaiva svārthamabhidadhāneṣu na vākyabhedādidoṣaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:415: nyā. pa. śa. 37 nanvarthavādādhikaraṇe “vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ” iti sarveṣāmarthavādānāṃ vidhyekavākyatvamuktam;
GSP29vnyps32u:421: api cautsargiṅkamāpavādikañca taṃ tamarthaṃ pratipādayatsu vākyeṣu viṣayavyavasthayā virodhaśamanaṃ vyākaraṇādiṣvapi dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP29vnyps32u:422: ata eva brāhmaṇaśeṣā arthavādā ityārṣamapi vākyamautsargikaviṣayamavagantavyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:423: yā tu śabdabhāvanaiva liṅādyartha iti kaumārilakusṛtiḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:428: na ca yāgādisvarūpe liṅādivyāpāre ca kenacid vākyena samuccitya pratipāditepi kaścit pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:429: liṅādeśca jñāyamānatvalakṣaṇavyāpāramātrācchaktilakṣaṇavyāpārādvā pravartakatve vyutpatteḥ prāgapi tataḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:430: vyutpatterapi sahakāritve tatsāpekṣāyā nirviṣayāyāstasyā asaṃbhavāt tadviṣayo vācyaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:431: na ca svavyāpāre liṅādiḥ kvacid vyutpannaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:432: sarveṣāmapi śabdānāṃ svavyāpārātirikta eva hyarthe vyutpatti /
GSP29vnyps32u:435: api tu śabdamātravyāpāre tatpravṛtteḥ sāmānyopādhikroḍīkāreṇa svavyāpārasyāpi niveśaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:436: ata evābhidhādiśabdābhidheyasya nimittasya ca sāmānyataḥ pratipannatvād vyutpattyupapattiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:437: liṅādestu svavyāpāre pratīte tatra vyutpattiḥ syāt;
GSP29vnyps32u:458: na ca liṅārthatvādeva nimantraṇādivad vidhirapi vaktrabhiprāyamātramiti vācyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:463: kartavyatāyā vidhyarthatve na kartavya iti nañanvayāvirodhāt;
GSP29vnyps32u:465: tathāhi vedārthasaṅgahe “liṅādeḥ koyamarthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ“' iti praśnapūrvakaṃ pratyuktam--- “yaja devapūjāyām,
GSP29vnyps32u:466: iti devatārādhanabhūtayāgādeḥ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāṃ vyutpattisiddhāṃ liṅādayobhidadhatīti na kiñcidanupapannam,
GSP29vnyps32u:467: kartṛvācināṃ pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthasya kartṛvyāpārasaṃbandhaprakāro hi vācyaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:470: bhāṣye cādyasūtre---“ato vidhivākyeṣvapi dhātvarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatāmātraṃ śabdānuśāsanasiddhameva liṅādervācyamityadhyavasīyate,
GSP29vnyps32u:472: samārādhitāt paramapuruṣāt phalasiddhiśceti 'phalamata upapatteḥ' iti pratipādayiṣyate” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:480: ityevamādiṣu lakāravācyakartṛviśeṣasamarpakāṇāṃ svargakāmādipadānāṃ niyojyaviśeṣasamarpakatvaṃ śabdānuśāsanāviruddham” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:481: yadyapi dīpagranthaḥ puṃsaḥ kartṛtvaṃ śrutisiddhamityatraiva tatparaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:482: tathāpi dhātvarthasādhyatāparaliṅādiṣvapi kartapradhānatayā vṛttiṃ pradarśya sāṃravyān pratikṣipatīti tādarthyāt tatrāpi tatparatvameva grāhyam
GSP29vnyps32u:483: pacatītyādau pākaṃ karotītyādinipuṇavyākriyāśca kṛtikarmatayaiva dhātvarthasyānvayaṃ vyañjayanti //
GSP29vnyps32u:484: nyā. pa. śa. 38 śrīgītābhāṣye caitad vyañjitam--- 'yudhyasva' ityatra 'yuddhākhyaṃ karmārabhasva' iti vyākhyānāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:485: vyākaraṇāt karaṇatayā ca dhātvarthasyānvaye kathaṃ kriyāviśeṣaṇasya karmavibhaktyantatā ?
GSP29vnyps32u:488: vartamānavyapadeśādiṣu ca sādhyāntarābhāvepi na viśeṣaṇamātraṃ sādhyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:492: na cākarmavibhaktyantena dhātunā karmavibhaktyantasya kathaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti vācyam,
GSP29vnyps32u:494: na ca prapavatīyamāne karmatvenānvaye kaściddoṣo dṛśyate,
GSP29vnyps32u:495: priyaṅgukāmaḥ kṛṣiṃ kuryāditivat svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryāditi vākyārthepi virodhābhāvāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:496: tadvadevārthatastasya tadupāyatvasiddheḥ keneti karaṇākāṅkṣāyā api śamanāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:500: cāṭuvādena rājānaṃ prīṇayeditivād yāgaṃ kuruṣvetyādau na kṛñarthasyāpi sādhyatvaprasaṅgaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:520: kathamityākāṅkṣāpūraṇaṃ tu bhavatāmasmākaṃ ca tulyameveti śābdoyaṃ panthāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:522: phalam ananuṣṭhāne pratyavāyaśca sarvapraśāsituḥ saṅkalpād bhavatītyapi vākyādavagatam /
GSP29vnyps32u:530: atra ca “svaśāsanāvabodhi śāstraṃ ca pradiśya” iti bhāṣyamabhisaṃhitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:533: ājñācchedī mama drohī madbhaktopi na vaiṣṇavaḥ” //
GSP29vnyps32u:537: tattvaratnākarakāraiścaivamuktam--- “kriyā tacchaktirvā kimapi tadapūrvaṃ pitṛsura- prasādo vā kartuḥ phalada iti raṅgeśa kudṛśaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:539: ” nityanaimittikādividhibhedeṣu ca praśāsiturabhiprāyaviśeṣāḥ vyañjitāḥ--- “ājñā te sanimittanityavidhayaḥ svargādikāmyadvidhiḥ sonujñā śaṭhacittaśāstravaśatopāyobhicāraśrutiḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:540: sarvā yasya samastaśāsituraho śrīraṅgarājasya te rakṣākūtanivedinī śrutirapi tvannityaśāstistataḥ” //
GSP29vnyps32u:542: api ca vedārthasaṅgahepyupāttaṃ draviḍabhāṣyam--- “svaśāsanānuvartino jñātvā kāruṇyāt svabhāvācchraddhayait vidvān karmadakṣaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:543: anantaraṃ cāyamevārtho bhagavadgītāyāmapi darśitaḥ--- “ye me matamidaṃ nityamanutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:547: iti svājñānuvartinaḥ praśasya viparītān vinindan punarapi svajñānupālanamakurvatāmāsuraprakṛtyantarbhāvamabhidhāyādhamā
GSP29vnyps32u:548: gatiścoktetir idṛśa eva vidhiśabdārtho vedāntibhiḥ svīkṛtaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:550: ato mūlaskandhīkṛtaniyogaṃ dhātvarthasya kartṛvyāpārasādhyatvaṃ vā nirviṣayapreraṇāsaṃbhavāt tatsādhyatvaparyantaṃ preṣaṇameva vā liṅādyasādhāraṇārthaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:554: nyā. pa. śa. 39 idaṃ ca vidhivākyānāmīśvaraśāsanātmakatvaṃ jaiminināpi sūcitameva--- “codanālakṣaṇortho dharmaḥ” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:555: codanāśabdo hi codakaṃ kañcit puruṣaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29vnyps32u:556: ahṛdayādapi śābarodāharaṇādidaṃ vyajyate--- “ācāryacoditaḥ karomīti hi dṛśyate” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:557: nyā. pa. śa. 40 evaṃ codanāśabdasūcitaśca puruṣaḥ svavākyena prāgeva viśeṣato darśitaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:560: “tatpramāṇaṃ bādarāyaṇasya” iti sūtrakhaṇḍe ca svasya svācāryabhūtabādarāyaṇasamānābhiprāyatvaṃ vyañjitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:561: sa ca bādarāyaṇo jaiminiṃ svaśiṣyamabhyupagateśvarāditattvaṃ “sākṣādapyavirodhaṃ jaiminiḥ” ityādiṣu bahuṣu sūtreṣvadarśayat /
GSP29vnyps32u:562: pratikṣepastu kvācitkaḥ anyaparoktyāpātapratītārthamandamatimohanirāsārtho vā kṣudrapramādamātrasyāpyuddhārārtho veti na pradhānavirodhakalpanaliṅgam
GSP29vnyps32u:563: arthavādādhikaraṇe ca “vidhinā tvekavākyatvāt stutyarthena vidhīnāṃ syuḥ” iti preraṇarūpavidhipratipādakaliṅādyavayavadvārā
GSP29vnyps32u:564: samudāyabhūtaṃ vidhyuddeśavākyaṃ lakṣayitvā tadekavākyatvamarthavādānāṃ vadan kṛtsnasya
GSP29vnyps32u:569: brāhmaṇamantrārthavādamayā hyanantā vedāḥ saṅkīrṇā vikīrṇāḥ kvacit kadācidutsannāśca /
GSP29vnyps32u:570: tatra kṛtsnavedino manvādayastattaddeśakālaviśeṣeṣvakṛtsnavedināṃ tattvānuṣṭhānaviplavapraśamanāya svānubhūtān vedārthān yathāvannibadhnanti;
GSP29vnyps32u:606: yathoktaṃ bhagavataiva--- “tvaṃ hi rudrapa mahābāho mohaśāstrāṇi kāraya /
GSP29vnyps32u:608: ahaṃ mohaṃ kariṣyāmi yo manaṃ mohayiṣyati /
GSP29vnyps32u:613: tat sarvaṃ vyapohya śiṣṭe ḥṃśe prāmāṇyaṃ grāhyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:616: pañcarātraṃ tu kṛtsnaṃ śrutivat smṛtivadvā pramāṇam,
GSP29vnyps32u:618: mahābhārate ca āptatama mānavadharmaśāstrasyāpi tanmūlatvokteratyādareṇa vyāsadiparigrahaviśeṣādīśvaradayāmūlatvena ca kāraṇadoṣaprasaṅgābhāvāt
GSP29vnyps32u:627: “saṅkarṣaṇo nāma jīvo jāyata” ityādestvavatārādigocaratvasya tatraiva siddheḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:628: śarīrake ca--- “utpattyasaṃbhavāt““na ca kartuḥ karaṇam” iti sūtradvayena pūrvapakṣaṃ
GSP29vnyps32u:629: kṛtvā “vijñānādibhāve vā tadapratiṣedhaḥ” “vipratiṣedhācca” iti tatprāmāṇyapratiṣedhaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:631: bhagavadyāmunamunibhiḥ parihāraḥ prapañcitaḥ iti neha pratanyate //
GSP29vnyps32u:635: smṛtyādīnāṃ hi śrutimūlatayaiva prāmāṇyamiti bhāṣyepyuktaṃ “taduparyapi” ityadhikaraṇe-- “saṅkīrṇabrāhmaṇamantrārthavādamūleṣu dharmaṃśāstretihāsapurāṇeṣu” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:636: nyā. pa. śa. 44 tata eva caiṣāṃ viprakīrṇaśākhāmūlatvaṃ siddhāntaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:639: te ca punarvyāsādibhiḥ kvacit kadācit pravartyante,
GSP29vnyps32u:641: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā āpastambena--- “teṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:642: manvādivacanaprāmāṇyaṃ nyāyamantareṇāpi śrutyaiva siddham--- “yadvai kiñca manuravadat tadbheṣajam” ityādibhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:649: ityāśaṅkyāha marīciḥ --- “durbodhā vaudikāḥ śabdāḥ prakīrṇatvācca ye khilāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:651: iti satyapi dharmaśāstre gṛhyāpekṣāṃ darśayati devalaḥ--- “manvādayaḥ prayoktāro dharmaśāstrasya kīrtitāḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:656: bhagavaddharmaśāstrasya tu pañcarātrasya śrutyādivirodhe ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāderiva deśakālādhikāryavasthāviśeṣaviṣayatayā vikalpa eva,
GSP29vnyps32u:659: “tasmāt sāṃkhyaṃ sayogaṃ sapaśupatimataṃ kutracit pañcarātraṃ sarvatraiva pramāṇaṃ tadidamavagataṃ pañcamādeva vedāt” //
GSP29vnyps32u:661: anyatra ca--- upaniṣadi tu bahvyāṃ vyāvaghoṣyāmadoṣa- pratihataguṇarāśirghuṣyate tārkṣyaketuḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:662: śrutirapi tadupajñaiḥ pañcarātrairvikalpaṃ na labhata iti sūktaṃ bhāṣyakṛdyāmunāryaiḥ” //
GSP29vnyps32u:668: ” ityādi vacanaṃ tu trayyantamūlatayā ekāyanaśrutimūlatayā ca yojyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:674: tathā ṛgvedapāṭhe paṭhitam--- “vratametat suduścaram” iti saṃvādapradarśanāt,
GSP29vnyps32u:678: atra bhagavadyāmunamunibhirevokto grantho likhyate--- “yadapyuktam--- 'garbhādhānādidāhāntasaṃskārāntarasevanāt bhāgavatānāma brāhmaṇyam' iti,
GSP29vnyps32u:681: yata ete vaṃśaparamparayā vājasaneyaśākhāmadhīyānāḥ kātyāyanādigṛhyoktamārgeṇa garbhādhānādisaṃskārān kurvate,
GSP29vnyps32u:682: ye punaḥ sāvitryanuvacanaprabhṛti trayīdharmātyāgena ekāyanaśrutivihitāneva catvāriṃśatsaṃskārān kurvate,
GSP29vnyps32u:683: tepi svaśākhāgṛhyoktadharmaṃ yathāvadanutiṣṭhamānā na śākhāntarīyakarmānanuṣṭhānāt brāhmaṇyāt pracyavante,
GSP29vnyps32u:685: sarvatra hi jāticaraṇagotrādhikārādivyavasthitā eva samayācārā upalabhyante /
GSP29vnyps32u:694: tathā kāśmīrāgamaprāmaṇyaṃ eva prapañcitamiti neha prastūyate /
GSP29vnyps32u:695: prakṛtānāṃ tu bhāgavatānāṃ sāvitryanuvacanāditrayīsambandhasya sphuṭataramu palabdhirna tattyāganimittavrātyatvādisandehaṃ sahate” iti //
GSP29vnyps32u:696: nyā. pa. śa. 45 caturvidhaṃ cedaṃ pañcarātram--- āgamasiddhāntaḥ,
GSP29vnyps32u:701: tadabhiprāyeṇa hyuktaṃ mahābhārate--- “mahato vedavṛkṣasya mūlabhūto mahānayam /
GSP29vnyps32u:703: caturṇāṃ caiṣāṃ lakṣaṇādikaṃ śrīpauṣkarādiṣu bhagavataiva darśitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:705: tat sarvaṃ śrīpāñcarātrarakṣāsiddhāntavyavasthāyāṃ sarvaparāmarśena sādhitamasmābhiriti tatraiva tadvistaraḥ sāttvatadharmagopturananyairanusandheya iti nātra prabrūmaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:706: evaṃ sthite kecid bāhlīkaprāyāḥ āgamabāhyāḥ śrīmadvaikhānasaprāmāṇye viśerate /
GSP29vnyps32u:721: anyathā sarvatra śrutismṛtyādīnāṃ tathā tathā saṃśayaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:733: dvayorapi parasparaprāmāṇyam “viṣṇostantraṃ dvidhā proktam” ityādiṣu vyañjitam /
GSP29vnyps32u:734: parasparākṣepavacanāni tu ikṣubhakṣakṛticikīrṣubhirasahiṣṇubhirupakṣiptāni vā svaśāstrapraśaṃsārthavādarūpāṇi veti na tato virodhaḥ //
GSP29vnyps32u:735: nyā. pa. śa. 46 nanu bhārgavādīni na tāvat kalpasūtrāṇi,
GSP29vnyps32u:748: tathāpi jīvānāmantatonyonyavaiṣamyamātrasya ca sārvatrikatvānnikṛṣṭādhikārikāṇi tānīti cenna,
GSP29vnyps32u:755: dṛśyante hyete vaṃśaparamparayā vedamadhīyānā vekhānasasūtroktavaidikasakalasaṃskāraśālino varṇāśramadharmakarmaṭhā bhagavadekāntā brāhmaṇāḥ
GSP29vnyps32u:756: nūnamamīṣāṃ brāhmaṇyaikakāraṇena bhāgavatatvenaiva viparītaṃ bambhramīti brāhmaṇagardabhaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:759: santu ca deśāntare kālāntare vā tadadhikāriṇaḥ;
GSP29vnyps32u:763: ; evaṃ ca sati sūtrāntarādiṣvapi kaḥ samāśvāsaḥ ? /
GSP29vnyps32u:776: tathā ca bhavato bhaviṣyato vā vivādasya vivādatvāviśeṣāt tataḥ paraṃ teṣāmanāśvāsaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29vnyps32u:777: asmākaṃ tāvat teṣu saṃśayo nāstīti cet,
GSP29vnyps32u:789: sa tu svamātāpitṛcaritānavadhāraṇena svabrāhmaṇyamapi yathārhamatiśaṅketeti jitaṃ lokāyatena /
GSP29vnyps32u:791: nāyaṃ lokosti na paro na sukha saṃśayātmanaḥ” //
GSP29vnyps32u:793: tat siddhaṃ viśiṣṭādhikārikaṃ vedāviruddhaṃ vaikhānasādismaraṇaṃ pramāṇamiti /
GSP29vnyps32u:799: “chandaḥ pādau śabdaśāstraṃ na vaktraṃ kalpaḥ pāṇī jyautiṣaṃ cakṣuṣī ca /
GSP29vnyps32u:800: śikṣā ghrāṇaṃ śrotramuktaṃ niruktaṃ vedasyāṅgānyāhuretāni ṣaṭ ca //
GSP29vnyps32u:801: ” evaṃ saparikaravedārthatattvanirṇayaviṣayā “athāto dharmajijñāsā” ityārabhya “anāvṛttiḥ śabdādanāvṛttiḥ śabdāt ityevamantā viṃśatilakṣaṇī mīmāṃsā /
GSP29vnyps32u:802: “tatra ca saṃhitametaccharīrakaṃ jaiminīyena ṣoḍaśalakṣaṇeneti śāstraikatvasiddhiḥ” iti bhāṣyopātto vṛttigranthaḥ //
GSP29vnyps32u:803: nyā. pa. śa. 47 tattvaratnākare tvevamuktam--- “karmadevatābrahmagocarā sā tridhodbhabhau sūtrakārataḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:810: “vedārthe nyāyacintye prathamamavasitaṃ karma taddevatā cā- thātaḥ śārīrakāṃśe niravadhikaphalabrahmacintā tvasūtri /
GSP29vnyps32u:811: tatrādhyāye parasmin svayamupaniṣadāmanvayosyāvirodho mokṣopāyotha muktirviṣayaviṣayiṇau siddhasādhyau dvikārthau //
GSP29vnyps32u:816: kramo viṃśatilakṣaṇyā na vaidhaḥ kintu yauktikaḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:818: nyā. pa. śa. 48 evaṃ viṃśatilakṣaṇīśravaṇamananābhyāṃ supratiṣṭhitasamastaśāstrārthasya mokṣasādhanatayā vidheyaṃ nididhyāsanaṃ na vākyārthajñānamātram,
GSP29vnyps32u:820: ata eva ca tasmin viśeṣe vedanādisāmānyaśabdaparyavasānam /
GSP29vnyps32u:826: tadeva ca nididhyāsanaṃ prītirūpaṃ prakaraṇaviśeṣāt samādhiḥ /
GSP29vnyps32u:836: na ca sādarapaṭusaṃskārapracayasaṃsiddhamedhāsaṃpadaḥ puruṣasya kośena kiñcit sāddhyam /
GSP29vnyps32u:839: adhīmahe ca-- “medhāmanīṣe mā viśatāṃ samīcīna bhūtasya bhavyasyāvaruddhyai” iti /
GSP29vnyps32u:841: na hi tasya śāstreṇa jñātavyaṃ tadānīmasti,
GSP29vnyps32u:845: iti, idaṃ tu tīvrasaṃvegināmalasāstikānāṃ ca grāhmam;
GSP29vnyps32u:848: dharmavidyāsthāneṣvapi hi bahirdaleṣvatisaṃrambho mumukṣorapodyate--- “na śabdaśāstrābhiratasya mokṣo na caiva ramyāvasathapriyasya /
GSP29vnyps32u:850: iti, tat śābdaṃ prameyatattvamadhijigamiṣatāṃ pramāṇeṣu sāram,
GSP29vnyps32u:853: yaḥ sarvatra yathāpuraṃ vitanute nāmāni viśvākṛti- rnityaṃ naḥ pratibhātu sarvavacasāṃ niṣṭhā sa nārāyaṇaḥ //
GSP29vnyps32u:854: iti śrīkavitārkikasiṃhasya sarvatantrasvatantrasya śrīmadveṅkaṭanāthasya vedāntānacāryasya kṛtiṣunyāyapariśuddhau śabdādhyāye dvitīyamāhnikam
